name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: Student vs. Master! Rock Lee vs. Might Guy! / I Will Surpass Guy Sensei!
short_description: The ninja of the Hidden Leaf are being tested on their combat skills. Later, Neji and Tenten succeed using their special attacks, but how will Lee stand up to Guy Sensei's Asakujaku?
